adDetails: GREAT PROFESSIONAL MOVING SERVICE We save you time and money. How? + We only have experienced movers who work efficiently and carefully. + We don't take smoke or phone breaks, we don't charge double drive time, and we don't damage your items. + We have all the necessary tools: shrink wrap,blankets, dollies, fourwheelers, pads, equipment, and the truck to get the job done. + We Disassemble/assembly furniture at no extra cost. + We have the experience, knowledge and determination to get the move done right + We work efficiently saving time and money. and you'll be 100% customer satisfied + We will no damage your items everything will be professionaly handled Long driveways, stairways and heavy items are not a problem. Short Notice is ok! Saving you time, saving you money!!!! our low rates for local jobs are: $70hr for 2 movers and truck $95r for 3 movers and truck call for schedule today 3 hour minimum per any job!!!! please call for your free estimate at show contact info
